message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a wide range of features that are sure to enhance your experience. Given its high-quality nature and unique capabilities, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $15000. I believe this price reflects the value and benefits you will receive. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe it's a bit above my budget, and I'm not sure if the features and benefits are worth the full $15000. Can we meet in the middle at $12000?
